name: Mortal Beings
desc: Under the "Butterfly Soul" state, each time all allies consume 1 Skill Point, DMG taken by all enemies increases by 10%, stackable up to 40%. After entering the "Butterfly Soul" state and consuming a total of 4 Skill Points for the first time, recover 6 attack count(s) of "Butterfly Soul," and before this "Butterfly Soul" state ends, after ally targets attack, deals 1 instance of True DMG equal to 60% of the original DMG (excluding Additional DMG) to the attacked target. This effect also applies to DoT taken by enemy targets at the start of their turn.
